synthesis_conditions.drying_method: degassed at 120 °C and high dynamic vacuum (10-10 bar)

breakthrough_experiments_conditions.equipment: 7 mm diameter fixed-bed tube of 120 mm length
additional_conditions: wet conditions with water vapour in the gas stream

desorption_conditions.additional_notes: Desorption conditions are very mild and not directly comparable with practical processes via either temperature-swing or pressure-swing operations.

regeneration_conditions.pressure_reduction: noted as effective for regeneration post adsorption of NO2

methods: high resolution synchrotron X-ray powder diffraction (PXRD)
structural_characterization.findings: Retention of crystal structure on NO2 adsorption and desorption, identification of NO2 and N2O4 binding sites, and confirmation of NO2 site I binding model.
